text: Pope Gregory II (; 669 – 11 February 731) was an Italian priest of the Roman Catholic Church and the 89th Pope from 19 May 715 to his death on 11 February 731. "List of Popes," Catholic Encyclopedia (2009); retrieved 2013-3-18. ==Early life== Gregory was born in Rome.Society for the Diffusion of Useful Knowledge. (1838). "Gregory II," Penny cyclopaedia, Vol. 11, p. 444. He was born in 669. "Pope St. Gregory II" at Catholic.org; retrieved 2013-3-19. == Pope == Gregory was elected pope in 731."Pope St. Gregory II," Catholic Encyclopedia; retrieved 2013-3-12. ==Related pages == * List of popes ==References== ==Other websites== * * "Gregory II", Encyclopædia Britannica, 1911 * Catholic Hierarchy, Popes in sequence Category:Italian popes Category:660s births Category:731 deaths
title: Pope Gregory II
